@graph.name: Vegan Chili Cheese Fries - Vegan Heaven
@graph.description: These vegan chili cheese fries are the perfect guilt-free treat when you're craving comfort food. They're packed with flavor and are super delicious!

@graph.headline: Vegan Chili Cheese Fries
@graph.keywords: meat-free chili cheese fries,vegan cheese sauce,vegan cheese sauce recipe,vegan cheese sauce with white beans,vegan chili cheese fries,vegan chili cheese fries recipe,vegan chili recipe,vegetarian chili cheese fries,veggie chili cheese fries,white bean cheese sauce vegan

@graph.name: Vegan Chili Cheese Fries
@graph.description: These vegan chili cheese fries are the perfect guilt-free treat when you're craving comfort food. They're packed with flavor and are super delicious!
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup unsweetened plant-based milk (preferably soy, almond, or oat)
green onions and fresh cilantro, to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat your oven to 350 °F. Cut the potatoes into french fries and bake them for about 30 minutes until they're crispy.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat your oven to 350 °F. Cut the potatoes into french fries and bake them for about 30 minutes until they're crispy.

recipeInstructions.text: In the meantime, make the chili. Heat some oil in a large pan and sauté the onion for about 2 minutes. Then add the garlic and cook it for one more minute. Add the the tomato paste, the chili and paprika powder, and cook for 2 minutes. Now add the liquid smoke (if using), the cumin, the diced tomatoes, the oregano, the kidney beans, the black beans, and the corn. Simmer for 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: In the meantime, make the chili. Heat some oil in a large pan and sauté the onion for about 2 minutes. Then add the garlic and cook it for one more minute. Add the the tomato paste, the chili and paprika powder, and cook for 2 minutes. Now add the liquid smoke (if using), the cumin, the diced tomatoes, the oregano, the kidney beans, the black beans, and the corn. Simmer for 10 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the vegan cheese sauce: Combine all ingredients in a high speed blender and blend until smooth and creamy.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the vegan cheese sauce: Combine all ingredients in a high speed blender and blend until smooth and creamy.

recipeInstructions.text: Once the fries are ready, add the chili and the cheese on top and bake for another 10 minutes. Serve with green onions, fresh cilantro, and black onions.
recipeInstructions.name: Once the fries are ready, add the chili and the cheese on top and bake for another 10 minutes. Serve with green onions, fresh cilantro, and black onions.
